rooms.description: The marsh gives way abruptly to sheer walls of black basalt. A narrow ravine cuts into the rock, its walls scarred with claw marks and scorch marks alike. rooms.name: Narrow Ledge
rooms.description: The path narrows to a precarious ledge along the gorge wall, with a sheer drop into darkness on one side. Cracks in the basalt vent plumes of hot steam, and patches of obsidian glint like black glass in the dim light. The gorge widens ahead, descending into its deepest reaches, while a shadowed alcove lies to the west.

The air thrums with a low vibration, and massive claw gouges in the stone walls speak of something immensely powerful that calls this place home.
